definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: As the recession deepens, Barbie’s conservative values are also back in vogue.
sentences.chinese: 随经济萧条恶化，芭比娃娃的保守价值也重振雄风。

sentences.english: Video Girl doll from Barbie comes with built-in digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 芭比娃娃的视频女孩，带有内置数码相机。

sentences.english: Later this month, BarbieGirls will be retooled in this way.
sentences.chinese: 在这个月下旬，芭比女孩将按这个模式重新包装。

sentences.english: I think starvation takes priority over hotwheels and barbies.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得饥饿使穷人无缘接触到赛车和芭比娃娃。

sentences.english: Barbie is once again the queen of the toyshop.
sentences.chinese: 芭比娃娃再度成为玩具店的女王。

sentences.english: This looks like it ought to have a Barbie logo on the back.
sentences.chinese: 这个造型看来应该在他的后背上贴个芭比的标志。

sentences.english: Korean media even gave her the a "King Kong Barbie" nickname.
sentences.chinese: 韩媒甚至给她起了一个“金刚芭比”的绰号。

sentences.english: Oh, that's Puppy and Barby's house.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那是帕皮和芭比的房子。

sentences.english: Some say Barbie is responsible for breast implants and eating disorders.
sentences.chinese: 有人说芭比娃娃是引起隆胸和饮食无规律的罪魁祸首。

sentences.english: What are you being such a weenie for?So he has a Barbie. Big deal.
sentences.chinese: 你干嘛这么小家子气他有个芭比，有什么大不了？

sentences.english: In every little girl's toy box, there might be a Barbie Doll .
sentences.chinese: 在每一个小女孩的玩具盒中，都有一个芭比娃娃。

sentences.english: But analysts said sales to Chinese consumers were poor.
sentences.chinese: 但是分析人员称，芭比娃娃在中国的销量非常低。

sentences.english: Move over(1) Barbie, veiled is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 芭比靠边站，穿着保守才是美。

sentences.english: Ask how Bobby and Snooky are doing.
sentences.chinese: 问他芭比和史努比怎么样？

sentences.english: Ruth came up with the idea for Barbie after watching her daughter play with paper dolls.
sentences.chinese: 鲁思是在见到女儿玩纸娃娃之后才想到做芭比娃娃的。

sentences.english: The Barbie doll look – where did that come from?
sentences.chinese: 芭比娃娃的外表从哪里来？

definition: Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
